CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Banco Santander (Brasil) SA is part of Santander Group, a Spanish bank present also in Brazil, Mexico, Argentina, and Chile. The bank's operations are divided into two major divisions: Commercial Banking provides services and products to individuals and companies. The revenue from this segment is derived from the banking and financial products and services available to the account and non-account holders. The Global Wholesale Banking offers a wide range of national and international tailored financial services and structured solutions for the global corporate customers, comprised mostly of local and multinational corporations. The bank has operations in Brazil and internationally.
